snippet.title: Bleeding Border_Gameplay Trailer_Steam Greenlight
snippet.description:
First gameplay and story trailer of Bleeding Border a survival horror game made by uruguayan studio CurseBox.

In BleedingBorder you need to scape a monster infected building using your blood as your only weapon.
